data.text:
airBaltic and @Airbus have signed an agreement on a revised A220-300 delivery schedule for the remaining 28 jets @airBaltic has on order. It will complete the firm order of 50 Airbus A220-300 jets by early 2024. 
✈️ Read more: https://t.co/F9QSjJxLkL https://t.co/mJ5D692MyD
@BizjakMatej Good morning! Thanks for the suggestion! 😊

Septembrī sadarbībā ar PIKC Liepājas Valsts tehnikumu uzsāksim jaunu programmu, kurā topošie gaisa kuģu mehāniķi varēs iegūt praktiskas zināšanas, strādājot @airBaltic Training autorizētajā @DiamondAircraft apkopes centrā  starptautiskajā lidostā Liepāja. https://t.co/uLSSv5dFDf https://t.co/708FfZZerY
@ChipperfieldNot Thank you for the compliment, we love it as well! 💚

All airBaltic flights are now operated with the new Airbus A220-300 aircraft. ✈️
#DidYouKnow that our average fleet age is only 2 years and 2 months? This makes airBaltic fleet one of the youngest in the Europe!

📸 by David Tomáško https://t.co/6aJNCGW4oZ
@Intl_elle Good evening! Thanks for sharing, glad you enjoyed the flight! Stay safe! ✈️

@ArnisKoleda We do understand your disappointment, however due to high workload it may take much longer time (up to few weeks) for our colleagues to process the e-mail. Therefore we can invite you to call us by the contacts provided (or those which can be found in your confirmation e-mail).

@ArnisKoleda Hello! To check for the current status of your refund request (if your ticket has been booked on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg), please contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise: https://t.co/9ZLiOgN2eR
We thank for your patience.

data.text: In July, the second full month since we resumed our operations, we've carried 151 529 or 251% more passengers than during June. We are pleased that @airBaltic has maintained connectivity in all Baltic countries by resuming flights more destinations. https://t.co/V0aPHATYod https://t.co/QnbucXKbmw
@BB4ll Hello! When flying with an infant - correct, both of these items are free of charge!

data.text:
@DarbyShawX Hello! We checked and your case is still under investigation. You will receive an answer once our colleagues have received information from all the parties.
We would also like to inform that customer claims are currently reviewed and answered within longer timeframe. Thank you.

@w0111_ If you need to reschedule a flight, for the most fastest assistance we kindly invite you to call us. As advised, lines are available therefore can invite you to call us again (late evenings/early mornings are not that busy). Thank you for patience.

@w0111_ Hello! As said in the message, we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department in this case: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD
Although our lines may be busy at times due to high amount of incoming calls, they are available. Thank you!

data.text: @JdeB020 Hello! Please send us more details about your reservation privately in DM message, we will check.
@kripf Labdien! Mūsu lidojumu grafiks tiek pārskatīts katru nedēļu, balstoties uz aktuālo iknedēļas ziņojumu no SPKC par koronavīrusa izplatību valstīs. Sīkākas detaļas: https://t.co/K2XX7FLoRf

@bettoarc1 @airbaltictrain @TurkishAirlines @KLM @staralliance Hello! We do understand your disappointment however as workload currently is very high it may take much longer time for an answer via e-mail. If assistance is needed immediately we kindly invite you to call us: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD
Thanks for your patience.

data.text:
Good morning Monday! ☀️
Quiz has concluded and exactly half of you got the right answer - the song performed by Latvian band Instrumenti, Lithuanian singer Jazzu and Estonian artist Ewert Sundja is called "Via Baltica"! 🎧
Listen it here: https://t.co/emVQ1cLENg https://t.co/EhPnnEnkgy
@ruu_elisa Hello! Please know we have replied to your private message. Allow us to continue our conversation there. Thank you!

Bija patiess gods piedalīties Latvijas aviācijas simtgades svētku programmā! Kā Latvijas nacionālā lidsabiedrība pēdējos 25 gados esam spēlējuši būtisku lomu nozares attīstībā un, izveidojot Pilotu akadēmiju, ļaujam jauniem cilvēkiem Latvijā sasniegt sapni kļūt par pilotiem. https://t.co/gTVsCIiEtJ
@SlavLosevs Labdien! Aicinām ar mums sazināties privāti, norādot Jūsu rezervācijas numuru. Paldies!

Neilgi pirms plkst. 15.00 tiekamies Spilves lidlaukā, kur Latvijas aviācijas simtgades svētku ietvaros skatītājus priecēsim ar īpašu @Airbus A220-300 lidmašīnas zemo pārlidojumu! ✈️ https://t.co/lpA1Fyp9SE

@kolesnikovax Labdien! Ja bērnam vecumā līdz 12 gadiem ir atsevišķa rezervācija, vai tiek izmantots pakalpojums “Bērns bez pavadoņa”, tiešsaistes reģistrācija nebūs pieejama - aicinām reģistrēties lidostā bezmaksas.

@Su_Juh Hello! Our apologies for the flight cancellation. Our lines are currently receiving many incoming calls therefore there can be some waiting time or connection issues at moments. We kindly invite you to try again a bit later. Thanks for your patience and understanding!

@madis_kaal Hello! Our lines are currently receiving many incoming calls therefore there can be some waiting time or connection issues at moments. We kindly invite you to try again a bit later. Thanks for your patience and understanding!

@oneofmillion_ Labdien!Šobrīd mūsu Zvanu centrs ir diezgan noslogots, tomēr lielākā daļa pasažieru mūsu aģentus sazvana. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām un aicinām zvanīt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk. Pateicamies par sapratni!
@KroegerJames Hello, James. We can confirm that all our numbers are available and working, however due to high amount of incoming calls there may be waiting. We thank for your patience!

@ketijae Labvakar! Šobrīd mūsu Zvanu centrs ir diezgan noslogots, tomēr lielākā daļa pasažieru mūsu aģentus sazvana. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām un aicinām zvanīt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk. Pateicamies par sapratni!
@grubnurg Aicinām sazināties ar mums privāti, norādot Jūsu rezervācijas numuru. Paldies!

@grubnurg Gadījumā, ja vēlaties sazināties ar mūsu Zvanu centru, tad informējam, ka šobrīd mūsu kolēģi ir diezgan noslogoti lielā ienākošo zvanu skaita dēļ. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām un aicinām zvanīt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk. Pateicamies par sapratni!
@grubnurg Labvakar! Ja biļete tika iegādāta mūsu mājaslapā, tad aicinām skatīt sadaļu "Mana Rezervācija", kur būs pieejama visa informācija par Jūsu tālākajām darbībām.

@viktorlukawski Hello! Our lines are currently receiving many incoming calls therefore there can be some waiting time or connection issues at moments. We kindly invite you to try again a bit later. Thanks for your patience and understanding!

@saltboiiiii Labdien! Šobrīd mūsu Zvanu centrs ir diezgan noslogots, tomēr lielākā daļa pasažieru mūsu aģentus sazvana. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām un aicinām zvanīt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk. Vairāk informācijas sakarā ar lidojumu atcelšanu: https://t.co/K2XX7FLoRf
@Vitenav Labdien! Aicinām skatīt informāciju, kas pieejama šeit: https://t.co/K2XX7FLoRf

@Nor_Man_Is Labdien! Šobrīd mūsu Zvanu centrs ir diezgan noslogots, tomēr lielākā daļa pasažieru mūsu aģentus sazvana. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām un aicinām zvanīt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk. Pateicamies par sapratni!
@ZeebraOnTour Hello! Please know we have replied to your private message. Allow us to continue our conversation there. Thank you!
@emmachomb Hello! May we ask you to DM us privately more details about your reservation? We will check, thank you!
@EdgarsZeilins Šobrīd Spilvē mūsu lidmašīnas pārlidojums plānots laika posmā no plkst. 14:55 – 15:10, taču ir iespējamas arī nelielas nobīdes.

Weekend is almost here which means #airBalticQuiz time again testing your knowledge!
Almost a year ago airBaltic together with artists from the Baltics created a unique song in celebration of the 30th anniversary of the Baltic Way! 🇪🇪🇱🇻🇱🇹
Do you remember the title of the song? 🎵
@MelnisM Vēlamies informēt, ka Jūsu rezervācijas apstiprinājuma e-pastā atrodams arī parastā tarifa tālruņa numurs domāts īpaši mūsu klientiem. Paldies!

@MelnisM Labdien! Lielās noslodzes dēļ atbildes uz e-pastiem tiek sniegtas daudz ilgākā laika posmā, kā sākotnēji norādīts (kas ir standarta laiks). Ja palīdzība ir nepieciešama uzreiz, aicinām mums zvanīt - līnijas var  būt noslogotas un ar gaidīšanas laiku, taču sasniedzamas. Paldies.
@Smarts086 @Talis_L @Airbus Labrīt! Šobrīd Spilvē mūsu lidmašīnas pārlidojums plānots laika posmā no plkst. 14:55 – 15:10, taču ir iespējamas arī nelielas nobīdes.

Additional flexibility to new reservations! When purchasing GREEN or GREEN plus tickets, add flight cancellation option to receive a full refund of your ticket in a form of @airBaltic gift card in case you wish to cancel your reservation. Read more: https://t.co/cn5dL73oW9 https://t.co/fQYYFJmRxV

Šo sestdien, 15. augustā, Spilves lidlaukā gaidāmo Latvijas aviācijas simtgades svētku programmas ietvaros Latvijas nacionālā lidsabiedrība @airBaltic piedalīsies ar īpašu @Airbus A220-300 lidmašīnas zemo pārlidojumu. https://t.co/MhkJqq6Cvz

data.text: @andrejsabrickis Labrīt! Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā privāti Jūsu rezervācijas numuru? Paldies!

@OMEGACLAP Hi! We kindly invite you to delete the tweet for your own safety as it contains your booking numbers which are sensitive details. Regarding the call centre, we can confirm that our lines are working and available however due to high amount of calls, there may be waiting. Thanks.

@natakrata Katrs gadījums ir individuāls, kā arī situācija un ierobežojumi nemitīgi mainās, tāpēc atbildi uz šādu jautājumu sniegt nevarēsim. Taču attiecībā uz šo nedēļu - jā, lidojumi no Viļņas tiek veikti.

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text:
Thanks to everyone who participated in this week's quiz! Almost 80% got the right answer - we announced a new direct route from Riga to Rhodes (Greece)! 🇬🇷
Flights are starting on August 6, 2020! See you on board! ✈️ https://t.co/rEj2n24UWL
@M31535663 Good morning! Bus infrastructure is provided by the airport, not the airline. However we understand your concern, we will pass your tweet to colleagues. Thank you!

Either you're waiting to greet your loved ones at the airport or checking your own upcoming flight status, the exact arrival and departure times for all @airBaltic flights are always available on our flight status page 👉https://t.co/Gil8O2pPx6 https://t.co/OJJuMwm0k0

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text:
Hello Friday! #airBalticQuiz is again here wondering whether you know all things airBaltic! 🤓
This time, can you name our newest destination which we announced to our network this week? We can give you a hint - it's a sunny one! 🏝

@MichaelByrne_7 Hello! To check for the current status of your refund request (if your ticket has been booked on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg), please contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise: https://t.co/9ZLiOgN2eR

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.
